channel.title: Team Bonuses
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Team Bonuses"

item.title: Re: Team Bonuses
item.content:encoded: I think we've got our version of this on the teams page.

item.title: Team Bonuses
item.content:encoded:
Here's a list of some teams: (Information from Random Village Forum)

Ninja Teams:

  • Any three females - Girl Power - +1 All Levels
  • Big Ro + Big Shammy + Big Bo - Fathers Know Best Bonus! - +2 Strength, +1 Range
  • Billy + Flipper - Learn to Excel - +1 Strength
  • Billy + Emosuke + Pinky - The Original Trio - +2 Levels
  • Billy + J-Diddy - Big Boss Bonus! - Superfrog will not leave your party!
  • Billy + Timmy - Sexy Jutsu Masters - +2 Successes
  • Billy Lvl. 2 + Emosuke Lvl. 2 - Never Say Yaoi Bonus! - +4 Range, +2 Strenght, 30% off chakra costs!
  • Billy Lvl. 2 + Pinky Lvl. 2 - Blossoming Affection Bonus! - +1 Strength, +2 Range!
  • Billy Lvl. 2 + Pinky Lvl. 2 + Stalkergirl Lvl. 2 - Crazy Love Triangle - +1 Strength, +3 Range
  • Billy Lvl. 2 + Stalkergirl Lvl. 2 - Unlikely Couple Bonus! - +1 Strength, +2 Range!
  • Billy Lvl. 3 - Demon Inside Bonus! - +3 Strength! +4 Range!
  • Billy Lvl. 3 + Emosuke Lvl. 3 - Ultimate Showdown Bonus! - Unlock The Impossible Mission!
  • Bruce Jr. + Bruce Sr. - Enter the Dragon - +1 Strength, 50% Off Chakra Costs!
  • Bruce Jr. + Lil' Whitey + Meatballs - Team Bruce Bonus! - 50% Off Chakra Costs!
  • Bruce Sr. + K-Dog - Duelling Jonin - +1 Success, +2 Strength!
  • Bruce Jr. + Mr. Sandman - Epic Battle Bonus! - +1 Strength!
  • Bugman + Red Rover + Stalkergirl - Eightball Bonus - +1 Strength, +2 Gen Levels
  • Emosuke + K-Dog - Masters of RedEye - +2 Nin Strength, Use RedEye for Free!
  • Emosuke Lvl. 2 + SNAKEMAN - Got Your Nose Bonus! - +3 Nin Strength, +3 Nin Range!
  • Lil' Bo + Lil' Ro + Lil' Shammy - Ro-Sham-Bo - +2 Levels
  • Lil' Bo Lvl. 2 + Lil' Ro Lvl. 2 + Lil' Shammy Lvl. 2 - Ro-Sham-Bo Redux Bonus! - +2 Range, +2 Strength, +1 Stamina per mission!
  • Lil' Ro + Big Ro - Ro Clan Bonus! +1 Gen Success, +1 Gen Range!
  • Lil' Whitey + Ol' Whitey + Stalkergirl - Team WhiteEye Bonus! - WhiteEye costs zero Chakra!
  • Lil' Whitey + Stalkergirl - The Siblings - +1 Tai Range, +1 Tai Strength
  • J-Diddy + The Rack - SILF Bonus! - +1 Range, +1 Success, +1 Strength!
  • J-Diddy + The Rack + SNAKEMAN = Big Three Bonus! - +3 Success!
  • K.Y. + Smokey the Bear - Fateful Lovers Bonus! - +1 Tai Success, +2 Strength!
  • Master P + Mr. Sandman + Terri - Team Sandy - +2 Gen Levels, +1 Strength
  • Mr. Smith + Timmy - Detention Bonus! - +2 Levels!
  • Pinky Lvl. 2 + The Rack - Femme Fatales Bonus! - +9 Stamina per mission, +2 Success, +2 Strength!
  • Red Rover + Rover's Mom - Wolfpack Bonus! - +1 Nin Range, +1 Nin Strength!
  • Red Rover + Spot - Let the Dog Out Bonus - +2 Success
  • The Rack + Yuri - Perfect Pair Bonus! - +2 Gen Levels, +1 Strength!
  • Timmy + Triple H - Skip a Generation - +1 Success
  • Trapchan + Z-Dog - Till the End Bonus! - +3 Strength, +1 Range!

Reaper Teams

  • Robogirl + TicTac - Off the Wall Bonus! - +3 Levels, +2 Stamina per mission
  • Mister Six + Shorty Lvl. 2 - Family Ties Bonus! - +2 Success, +2 Range
  • Shorty + Strawberry - Reapers Bonus! - +1 Range, +1 Success
  • Shorty + Tats - Old Friends Bonus! - +2 Success!
  • Strawberry + Robogirl - Crazy Couple - +3 Gen Success
